data.description:
Immerse yourself in First Flight Racing, the peak of VR drone racing, where agility meets adrenaline in time trials and multiplayer clashes. Race through numbered gates and flags across hangars and airfields, against up to 8 opponents in a stunning, pulse-pounding setting.

First Flight Racing elevates the experience with multiple perspectives — first-person view puts you right in the cockpit, third-person view broadens your vantage point, and pilot view offers a strategic angle that combines both proximity and perspective. Each view promises a unique and immersive flight experience that caters to your racing style.

Catering to players of all skill levels, this game offers a dual-mode flight system. In Level Flight Mode, enjoy the simplicity of steady flight, perfect for beginners. For the more daring, and those who appreciate precision and control, Acrobatic Mode allows for breath taking stunts, flips, and rolls — transforming each race into an aerial battle where skill and style reign supreme.

More circuits and locations are added regularly.

Ready to ascend to racing legend? Join a community of racers, soar to new heights, and indulge in the ultimate drone racing escapade. With expansive environments, innovative flight dynamics, and comprehensive control schemes, your quest for drone racing glory begins here. Strap in, seize the controls, and prepare for an unrivalled takeoff into the world of First Flight Racing. Are you ready to dominate the skies?
